```{r}
install.packages("sf")
library(sf)
library(dplyr)

jaguarundi <- read.csv("data/herpailurusYagouaroundi.csv")
shapefile <- st_read("data/geodata/LatinAmerica.shp")

is_valid <- st_is_valid(shapefile)

shapefile <- st_make_valid(shapefile)



jaguarundi_sf <- st_as_sf(jaguarundi, coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326)
joined_data <- st_join(jaguarundi_sf, shapefile)



locality <- joined_data$CNTRY_NAME

jaguarundi <- jaguarundi %>%
  mutate(Country = locality)



```
